description: Number of restricted forests in Moebius ladder M_n.
links: J. P. McSorley, Counting structures in the Moebius ladder, Discrete Math., 184 (1998), 137-164.
formula: For large n, (4.8820)^n < a(n) < (6.4188)^n (Th. 10.1.). - C. Ronaldo (aga_new_ac(AT)hotmail.com), Jan 17 2005
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
